description: Looking for a nice, tall, dark and kind lady that is agreeable and wants to have nice life living in a nice part of USA. I am tall and kind hearted to the girl I am with. I am comfortable doing many things from the city life to the country life. Respectful to all people on our planet Earth. Hope to find someone that is interested in being a partner in life, wiling to work together on all matters and even when we don't agree be willing to compromise for a solution.
